messages.room.description.blue:
Real apartment, the Sapphir Room can accommodate 2 people.
In an elegant and luxurious style, this room provides you a moment of rest and calm.
messages.room.description.green:
Spacious and luminous, the Opale room has one large and soft bed.
With lovers, friends or family, enjoy its warm environment.
messages.room.description.red:
To enjoy a romantic week end or a city break, the Ruby Room can accommodate 2 guests.
Its lounge atomosphere and authentic character will seduce you et make your journey ... unforgettable.
